attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2007-1788

Date: 2007-11-22

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Finance, hereby amends the English version of Order in Council P.C. 2007-1603 of October 18, 2007 by replacing paragraph (d)(i) with the following:

 

“(d)      pursuant to section 50 of the Financial Administration Act,

 

(i) designates any one of those persons occupying from time to time the position of Senior Associate Deputy Minister of Finance, Associate Deputy Minister of Finance, Assistant Deputy Minister, Financial Sector Policy Branch, Department of Finance, General Director, Financial Sector Policy Branch, Department of Finance, Director, Financial Markets Division, Department of Finance, Senior Chief, Capital Markets Policy Section, Financial Markets Division, Department of Finance, Chief, Government Financing Section, Financial Markets Division, Department of Finance, Chief, Debt Management Policy Section, Financial Markets Division, Department of Finance, or Chief, Reserves and Risk Management Section, Financial Markets Division, Department of Finance, as a person who may sign on behalf of the Deputy Minister of Finance or countersign those security certificates and interest coupons, if any. A person who has signed such security certificates and interest coupons may not countersign them, and”



Sur recommandation du ministre des Finances, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil modifie la version anglaise du décret

C.P. 2007-1603 du 18 octobre 2007 en remplaçant l’alinéa (d)(i) par ce qui suit :

 

“(d)      pursuant to section 50 of the Financial Administration Act,

 

(i) designates any one of those persons occupying from time to time the position of Senior Associate Deputy Minister of Finance, Associate Deputy Minister of Finance, Assistant Deputy Minister, Financial Sector Policy Branch, Department of Finance, General Director, Financial Sector Policy Branch, Department of Finance, Director, Financial Markets Division, Department of Finance, Senior Chief, Capital Markets Policy Section, Financial Markets Division, Department of Finance, Chief, Government Financing Section, Financial Markets Division, Department of Finance, Chief, Debt Management Policy Section, Financial Markets Division, Department of Finance, or Chief, Reserves and Risk Management Section, Financial Markets Division, Department of Finance, as a person who may sign on behalf of the Deputy Minister of Finance or countersign those security certificates and interest coupons, if any. A person who has signed such security certificates and interest coupons may not countersign them, and”
